post.summary: Notify order has being delivered to end customer.
Set all delivery state to processing after export order to ERP.
Build RMA from information in the return slip.

Build RMA based on sales order id. 
All articles that can be returned are included in the rma created, and will result in a full return of all remaining items of the sales order.
Set the rma state to completed.
Set the rma state to package received.
Set the rma state to processing.

get.summary: Gets the order which is composed with RMA.

post.description: In implementation, this should send a mail to the end-customer about the return as confirmed, and refund is under processing.

post.summary: Refund the money to customer, and finish the sales return order process.

id.description: Gets or sets the address identifier.

originalSalesOrderId.description:
Gets or sets the original sales order identifier.
Only available for Sales Return Order.
Get SystemId of the SalesOrder that linked to this SaleReturnOrder. 
The original Sales order should always have this property null.

salesReturnOrderIds.description: Gets or sets a collection of system identifiers for associate sales return orders.

rmaIds.description: Gets or sets the Rma system identifiers for associate Rma. The original Sales order should always have this property null.

comments.description: Gets or sets the order comments.

additionalInfo.description: Gets or sets the order additional information. The value should be JSON serializable.

rows.description: Gets or sets the collection of the order row.

vatSummary.description:
Gets or sets the vat summary.
Key is vat rate.
Value is the total vat amount for the vat rate.

promotions.description: Gets or sets the collection of promotions.

payments.description: Gets or sets the collection of payments.

shipments.description: Gets or sets the collection of shipments.

shippingInfo.description: Gets or sets collection of shipping information.

rmas.description: Gets or sets the rma's that belong to this order.

unitPriceExcludingVat.description: Gets the unit price with vat excluded.

vatRate.description:
Gets or sets the vat rate up to 3 decimals.
E.g: 8.25% should be 0.825.

totalExcludingVat.description: Gets or sets the total with vat excluded.
